dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: One of the key changes includes introducing a 50-percent discount on railway tickets for those accompanying individuals with disabilities in the first and second categories, as well as for those assisting children with special needs.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The proposed changes are currently under review and are expected to take effect in the second half of 2025. As a reminder, a 50-percent discount on socially significant routes is already available to individuals with disabilities of all groups.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additionally, passengers with special needs will no longer be required to present supporting documents or medical certificates when boarding a train.
